pkgmetadata.longdescription: Overview========Python library to interface with a WordPress blog's `XML-RPC API`__.__ http://codex.wordpress.org/XML-RPC_SupportAn implementation of the standard WordPress API methods is provided,but the library is designed for easy integration with customXML-RPC API methods provided by plugins.This library was developed against and tested on WordPress 3.5.This library is compatible with Python 2.6+ and 3.2+.Please see docs for more information: http://python-wordpress-xmlrpc.rtfd.org
